thread.title: Trump to order National Guard to protect border with Mexico: official

title: Trump to order National Guard to protect border with Mexico: official
text:
Trump to order National Guard to protect border with Mexico: official   01:04 
President Donald Trump will sign a proclamation on Wednesday ordering the deployment of the National Guard to help protect the border with Mexico, Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen said. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Donald Trump will sign a proclamation on Wednesday ordering the deployment of the National Guard to help protect the border with Mexico, Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen said. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2H8WNJA
